verbs.description: red sox [V: do] not invite curt schilling to 2004 world series reunion numerous members of the 2004 boston red sox will reunite wednesday night to throw out a ceremonial first pitch but curt schilling will not be among them seven members of the 2004 sox will be on hand for the first pitch ahead of game 2 of the world series schilling still lives in the area but the red sox confirmed that he was not invited to take part ceremonial first pitch tonight curt schilling boston red sox 2004 world series red sox world series
